original_title: WWE: Bret "Hitman" Hart - The Best There Is, The Best There Was, The Best There Ever Will Be
overview: The documentary shows Hart from his early days of learning about professional wrestling his father's " Dungeon " to his reigns a WWF World Heavyweight Champion to the dramatic downfall at Survivor Series 1997.
title: WWE: Bret "Hitman" Hart - The Best There Is, The Best There Was, The Best There Ever Will Be
